ygData.subject: Personal note
ygData.msgSnippet: My grandfather died this afternoon and I just found out about an hour ago.  He was my last living grandparent.  I was expecting his death soon.

My grandfather died this afternoon and I just found out about an hour 
ago.  He was my last living grandparent.  I was expecting his death 
soon.
